name: How to Get a Japanese Girlfriend (And Save the World)
name_original: How to Get a Japanese Girlfriend (And Save the World)
description:
Catch your breath and brace yourself for a heart-pounding journey into the depths of passion and peril with our thrilling adult visual novel! In a near-future Japan besieged by colossal kaiju, you'll step into the shoes of a seasoned veteran, summoned from distant lands to combat these towering beasts.

But amidst the chaos of battle lies an unexpected twist - three captivating Japanese women, each with their own unique skills and allure, stand by your side. Will you choose the brilliant scientist, unraveling the mysteries of kaiju with her intellect and charm? Or perhaps the skilled mecha pilot, whose daring maneuvers both in and out of battle leave you breathless? And let's not forget the inventive mechanic, whose genius inventions and fiery spirit ignite a flame of passion amidst the chaos.

Develop deep, meaningful relationships with these captivating women as you uncover the secrets of the kaiju, battle fierce adversaries, and uncover the truth behind the apocalypse threatening Japan.



Hikari, the brilliant scientist, captivates with her sharp intellect and unwavering determination. Her relentless pursuit of knowledge in the face of chaos adds an intriguing depth to her character, making every interaction a captivating exploration of mind and heart.



Yuki, the ingenious engineer whose fiery spirit and innovative prowess light up the darkness of battle-scarred Japan. Her dedication to crafting inventive solutions to combat the kaiju threat reveals a fierce determination tempered by compassion. Engaging with Yuki unveils layers of complexity as her steadfast resolve and unwavering determination shine through, offering a compelling glimpse into a soul forged in the fires of adversity.



Akane, the skilled mecha pilot whose daring maneuvers and fearless resolve command respect amidst chaos. Her unwavering commitment to protecting Japan and her comrades adds a thrilling edge to every encounter, as her fiery passion for life and duty intertwine in a mesmerizing dance of bravery and vulnerability.
